entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Throwing in a background thread freezes the UI when debugging a MAUI app #23261
  • Cannot use Shared Project with MAUI #23260
  • Migration from Xamarin to Net8.0 : Cleartext communication not enabled #23259
  • Can't find any video content illustrating how to add a Google Map in a Blazor Hybrid Mobile Application can anyone provide links #23258
  • GetTemplateChild returns null when entry not in layout (e.g. VerticalStackLayout) #23257
  • MAUI Picker Behavior Discrepancy Between Material Design PickerField and Standard Picker in Xamarin.Forms Tab Navigation #23256
  • MaterialIconsOutlined-Regular in Release version doesn't work #23255
  • Maui .Net 8 iOS MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync issue returns null after user presses USE PHOTO on apple device #23254
  • net8 MainPage.xaml Button problem Clicked = "OnClickButton5" does not work!!!<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <ContentPage xmlns="http://sch #23253
  • Maui not building in Azure pipeline #23252
  • VisualElement.OnMeasure currently routes to some inconsistent logic compared to OnMeasureOverride #23244
    9.0-preview7
  • Icons showing up in the wrong places when using StreamImageSource as a source for images inside a CollectionView #23240
  • Getting multiple issues when adding .aar file in android binding library. #23237
  • [iOS} Crashed: tid_103 EXC_BAD_ACCESS KERN_INVALID_ADDRESS 0x0000000000000000 #23235
  • Incorrect item displayed when window scale and layout value is greater than 100 #23233

Closed

  • Unable to trigger focus on Picker programatically #23227
  • [Testing] NativeAOT: Publish a test application for AOT #22310
    Backlog
  • Sample app for getting started tutorial not live updating #23236
  • Error when building MAUI project in visual studio: WMC0001 Unknown type 'xxx' in XML namespace 'http://schemas.microsoft.com/dotnet/2021/maui' #19896
  • Color.FromHsla only returns white color #23180
  • Toggling FlyoutLayoutBehavior on Android causes the app to crash #18161
    Backlog
  • FlyoutPage Android app crashing on orientation change #20858
    Backlog
  • Add better support for Android 12+ Splash Screen APIs #23228
  • iOS - Basic collection view elements don't render properly. #15164
  • CarouselView scrolling slow if it contains CollectionView in Android app #8436
  • iOS Crashing when navigating pages / memory leak with imageSource/CollectionView. #17790

PullRequests

Created

  • Move tests to new location #23251
  • Support the new RIDs on WinUI #23247
  • Do not include Maui.InTree.targets for an AspNet.Core project #23246
  • [Android] Avoid double event subscribes in gesture manager #23242
  • [Binding SG] Add an API for creating instances of TypedBinding #23239
  • [Android] Programmatically creating FormattedString Spans with GestureRecognizers causes duplicate Command runs #23238
    community ✨

Merged

  • Bump Previous DotNet Released Version #23245
  • Obsolete IBorder #23224
  • [Essentials] Add DateTimeOffset overload in Preferences #22815
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23126
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23243
  • Revert "[net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 (#23126)" #23241
  • Renamed the project because macOS uses .app #23223
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area-controls-scrollview
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Android] fix TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped called multiple times on Android #23183
    community ✨
  • Application Crash Due to Incorrect Use of <ReorderableItemsView> Instead of <CollectionView> for Reordering Items - fix #23221
    community ✨
  • [XC] Compile "standalone" bindings #22023
    area-xaml
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-templates
  • [Binding SG] Split bindings source generated code into multiple files #23116
    area-xaml
  • [Android] Android Ecosystem version bumps #23117
    area-infrastructure
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2151.40` to `1.0.2592.51` #23209
    area-blazor, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
